summary: Completed comprehensive Phase 2 testing of temple web application. All backend APIs working perfectly (30/30 tests). New features successfully implemented: donations (e-Hundi + AnnaPrasadam), accommodation booking, gallery, news, paroksha seva, ticket lookup, about page. Frontend mostly functional with minor automation selector issues. Payment MOCKED as expected.

ui_bugs.issue: Images not loading immediately on first visit (0 items shown initially)

integration_issues.issue: Form input selectors not responding in automation (input[name='username'] timeout)
Register link selector inconsistency - shows as link not button

passed_tests: Backend API comprehensive testing (30/30 tests - 100%)
Homepage loads with news ticker, hero section, 6 service cards, footer
Full navigation bar with all 9 links (Pratyaksha Seva, Paroksha Seva, e-Hundi, AnnaPrasadam, Accommodation, Gallery, About, Print Ticket, Sign In)
News page displays 3 news items with bilingual content and important flags
Gallery page with category filters and lightbox functionality
Accommodation page shows 4 room types (AC, Non-AC, Cottage, Dormitory) with pricing
About Temple page with history, significance, festivals, how to reach sections
Print Ticket / Ticket Lookup page with booking number and mobile search
e-Hundi donation complete flow: preset amounts → form fill → success with donation number
AnnaPrasadam donation complete flow: different amounts → anonymous option → success
Payment status correctly shows 'Paid (MOCKED)' for all bookings/donations
Paroksha Seva API returns 5 sevas with is_paroksha_available=true
Paroksha booking flow creates remote seva booking successfully
Donation system: e-Hundi (Rs.501) + AnnaPrasadam (Rs.1000) working
Admin donation stats showing separate totals for e-Hundi and AnnaPrasadam
Accommodation booking system: 4 room types, date selection, payment auto-marked Paid
Gallery system: 6 images with categories (Temple, Festival, Seva, Devotees)
News system: 3 bilingual news items with important flagging
Ticket lookup: search by booking number returning correct results
Bilingual content throughout (Telugu + English) properly displayed

success_percentage.backend: 100% (30/30 tests passed - all Phase 2 features working)
success_percentage.frontend: 85% (core functionality working, minor automation selector issues)

action_item_for_main_agent: Minor frontend fixes needed: 1) Gallery images loading delay issue, 2) Admin login form selector consistency, 3) Devotee registration flow navigation. All core functionality is working correctly.
